introductionText: Welcome to Doos App. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting the information you share with us. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and the choices available to you regarding your information.
informationWeCollectText:
Information You Provide

We may collect personal information that you voluntarily submit, such as:

‚Ä¢ Your name
‚Ä¢ Email address
‚Ä¢ Phone number
‚Ä¢ Content submitted through forms, support requests, or registration inside the app

Automatic Information

When you use Doos App, we may automatically collect:

‚Ä¢ Device information (model, operating system, identifiers)
‚Ä¢ Usage data (screens visited, time spent, interaction logs)
‚Ä¢ IP address
‚Ä¢ App version and technical diagnostics
howWeUseInformationText:
We use your information to:

‚Ä¢ Improve app features and performance
‚Ä¢ Communicate with you about your account or support inquiries
‚Ä¢ Send optional notifications or updates if you consent
‚Ä¢ Analyze technical data to optimize the user experience
‚Ä¢ Enhance app stability and functionality
locationInformationText:
Doos App may request access to your device's location while the app is in use (foreground only) to enable map features and improve user experience.

üìå We do NOT access or use background location.

üìå We do NOT track users when the app is closed or not in use.

üìå Your location is shared with Google Maps (third-party service) ONLY for:
   ‚Ä¢ Displaying maps centered on your location
   ‚Ä¢ Showing directions and routes
   ‚Ä¢ Finding nearby services

üìå Your location is NOT shared for marketing, advertising, or tracking purposes.

We use Google Maps API to provide map functionality. Your location coordinates are sent to Google Maps only for these functional purposes and are subject to Google's Privacy Policy. We do not use your location for any other third-party services or marketing purposes.
You can manage your location permission anytime in device settings.
cameraAndPhotoAccessText:
Doos App may request access to your device's camera and photo library to allow you to:

‚Ä¢ Take photos for your profile picture
‚Ä¢ Select images from your gallery for listings (cars, products, services)
‚Ä¢ Upload images to enhance your app experience

üìå We only access your camera and photo library when you explicitly choose to upload or take a photo.

üìå We do NOT access your photos or camera without your permission.

üìå Photos you upload are stored securely and are only used for the purposes you intended (profile pictures, listings, etc.).

You can manage camera and photo library permissions anytime in device settings.
informationSharingText:
We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

üìå IMPORTANT: Your location data is shared with Google Maps (third-party service) ONLY for functional purposes:
   ‚Ä¢ Displaying maps and routes
   ‚Ä¢ Finding nearby services
   ‚Ä¢ Providing directions

üìå Your location is NOT shared for marketing, advertising, or tracking purposes.

We may share limited data with trusted service providers:

‚Ä¢ Google Maps API (receives location coordinates for map display and directions - subject to Google's Privacy Policy)
‚Ä¢ Hosting providers (for app data storage - no location data)
‚Ä¢ Analytics services (for app performance monitoring - no location data)
‚Ä¢ Payment processors (if applicable - no location data)

These providers are bound by strict confidentiality and data protection obligations. Your location is only used for the functional purposes stated above and is not used for marketing or tracking.
cookiesText:
If Doos App includes any web-based features, it may use cookies or similar technologies to enhance your experience.
You may disable cookies in your device or browser settings, but some features may not work properly.
dataSecurityText:
We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, misuse, or loss.
However, no system is completely secure, so please be cautious when sharing sensitive information.
dataRetentionText:
We keep your data only for as long as necessary to:

‚Ä¢ Provide services
‚Ä¢ Improve the app
‚Ä¢ Comply with legal requirements

After this period, your data is securely deleted.
linksToOtherSitesText:
Doos App may contain links to external websites or services.
We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those third-party services, and we encourage you to review their privacy policies before sharing any personal information.
changesToPolicyText:
We may update this Privacy Policy periodically.
When changes occur, we will update the "Last Updated" date at the top of this page.
pleaseAcceptPrivacyPolicy: Please accept the privacy policy to continue
pleaseAcceptTermsAndConditions: Please accept the terms and conditions to continue

foregroundLocationDisclosureMessage: To provide you with the best experience, Dooss needs to access your location while you're using the app. This helps us show you nearby services and relevant content based on your location.
foregroundLocationReason1: Show nearby car services and dealerships
foregroundLocationReason3: Improve your experience with personalized content based on your location
foregroundLocationPrivacyNote: Your location is shared with Google Maps (third-party service) ONLY for map display and directions. Your location is NOT shared for marketing, advertising, or tracking purposes. You can control location permissions through your device settings at any time.
locationDisclosureMainMessage: Dooss needs access to your location to provide you with nearby car services, dealerships, and help you find the closest options. Your location is only used while the app is open and active.
whatDataWeCollectContent:
When you grant location permission, we collect:

‚Ä¢ **Latitude and Longitude**: Your current GPS coordinates (e.g., 25.2048, 55.2708)
‚Ä¢ **Location Accuracy**: How precise your location is (in meters)
‚Ä¢ **Timestamp**: When the location was accessed
‚Ä¢ **Speed and Heading**: If available from your device GPS

**This data is used only to:**
‚Ä¢ Find nearby car services, gas stations, and dealerships within a 5km radius
‚Ä¢ Calculate distances between your location and services
‚Ä¢ Display your location on interactive maps
‚Ä¢ Show driving directions and routes to services
‚Ä¢ Sort services by distance (closest first)

**We do NOT collect:**
‚Ä¢ Your location history or movement patterns
‚Ä¢ Location data when the app is closed
‚Ä¢ Background location tracking
‚Ä¢ Any location data for marketing or advertising
locationReason1: Find nearby car services, gas stations, and dealerships within 5 kilometers of your current location
locationReason2: Calculate accurate distances and travel routes using Google Directions API to help you choose the closest services
locationReason3: Display interactive maps showing your location and nearby service locations with turn-by-turn directions
howWeUseLocationContent:
Your location coordinates are used in the following ways:

**1. Finding Nearby Services**
We send your latitude and longitude coordinates to our server API to search for car services, gas stations, and dealerships within a 5km (5000 meters) radius of your current location.

**2. Distance Calculation**
We calculate the distance between your location and each service using:
‚Ä¢ Google Directions API for accurate road distance (when available)
‚Ä¢ Straight-line distance as a fallback method
This helps us sort services by proximity, showing the closest options first.

**3. Map Display**
Your location is shared with Google Maps API (third-party service) to:
‚Ä¢ Display your current position as a blue marker on the map
‚Ä¢ Show nearby service locations as red markers
‚Ä¢ Provide turn-by-turn driving directions and routes
‚Ä¢ Calculate estimated travel time and distance

**4. Service Sorting**
Services are automatically sorted by distance from your location, ensuring you see the most convenient options first.

**Important**: Your location coordinates are processed in real-time and are NOT stored on our servers. We only access your location when you actively use location-based features like the Services tab.
privacyCommitmentContent:
Your location data is:

‚úÖ Only used while the app is open and active (foreground only)
‚úÖ Shared with Google Maps ONLY for map display and directions
‚úÖ NOT stored on our servers or databases
‚úÖ NOT used for marketing, advertising, or tracking
‚úÖ NOT shared with any other third parties
‚úÖ Processed in real-time and discarded after use

You can revoke location permission at any time through your device settings, and the app will continue to work (using a default location for service search).
